info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 04 at 7:38PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...AN AREA OF MODERATE SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF EASTERN ALBANY... WESTERN RENSSELAER...EASTERN SCHENECTADY...WESTERN SCHENECTADY...AND SOUTHERN SARATOGA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...An area of moderate snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile and lead to slippery travel conditions. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 734 PM EST, an area of moderate snow was located between Scotia and Voorheesville, moving south southeast at 15 MPH. THIS AREA OF MODERATE SNOW WILL BE NEAR... Scotia and Alplaus through 815 PM EST. Niskayuna through 830 PM EST. Schenectady and Rotterdam through 830 PM EST. Colonie, Guilderland and Altamont through around 9 PM EST. This includes the following highways... Interstate 88 near exit 25. Interstate 90 between exits 10 and 26. Interstate 890 between exits 1a and 9. Interstate 87 between exits 22 and 6. Interstate 787 between exits 1 and 6. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
